verses.verse: Now there was a certain<WH259> man<WH376> of Ramathaim-zophim<WH7436>, of the hill-country<WH2022> of Ephraim<WH669>, and his name<WH8034> was Elkanah<WH511>, the son<WH1121> of Jeroham<WH3395>, the son<WH1121> of Elihu<WH453>, the son<WH1121> of Tohu<WH8459>, the son<WH1121> of Zuph<WH6689>, an Ephraimite<WH673>:

but unto Hannah<WH2584> he gave<WH5414> a<WH259> double<WH639> portion<WH4490>; for he loved<WH157> Hannah<WH2584>, but Jehovah<WH3068> had shut up<WH5462> her womb<WH7358>.
And her rival<WH6869> provoked<WH3707> her sore<WH3708>, to make her fret<WH7481>, because Jehovah<WH3068> had shut<WH5462> up<WH1157> her womb<WH7358>.

And she vowed<WH5087> a vow<WH5088>, and said<WH559>, O Jehovah<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635>, if thou wilt indeed<WH7200> look<WH7200> on the affliction<WH6040> of thy handmaid<WH519>, and remember<WH2142> me<WH7911>, and not forget thy handmaid<WH519>, but wilt give<WH5414> unto thy handmaid<WH519> a man-child<WH582>, <WH2233> then I will give<WH5414> him unto Jehovah<WH3068> all the days<WH3117> of his life<WH2416>, and there shall no razor<WH4177> come<WH5927> upon his head<WH7218>.

Now Hannah<WH2584>, she spake<WH1696> in her heart<WH3820>; only her lips<WH8193> moved<WH5128>, but her voice<WH6963> was not heard<WH8085>: therefore Eli<WH5941> thought<WH2803> she had been drunken<WH7910>.
And Eli<WH5941> said<WH559> unto her<WH7937>, How long wilt thou be drunken? put away<WH5493> thy wine from thee<WH3196>.

And Hannah<WH2584> answered<WH6030> and said<WH559>, No<WH113>, my lord, I am a woman<WH802> of a sorrowful<WH7186> spirit<WH7307>: I have drunk<WH8354> neither wine<WH3196> nor strong drink<WH7941>, but I poured out<WH8210> my soul<WH5315> before<WH6440> Jehovah<WH3068>.

And the man<WH376> Elkanah<WH511>, and all his house<WH1004>, went up<WH5927> to offer<WH2076> unto Jehovah<WH3068> the yearly<WH3117> sacrifice<WH2077>, and his vow<WH5088>.

And Elkanah<WH511> her husband<WH376> said<WH559> unto her<WH6213>, Do what seemeth<WH5869> thee good<WH2896>; tarry<WH3427> until thou have weaned<WH1580> him<WH3068>; only Jehovah establish<WH6965> his word<WH1697>. For this child<WH5288> I prayed<WH6419>; and Jehovah<WH3068> hath given<WH5414> me my petition<WH7596> which I asked of him<WH7592>:
therefore also I have granted<WH7592> him to Jehovah<WH3068>; as long as he liveth<WH3117> he is granted<WH7592> to Jehovah<WH3068>. And he worshipped<WH7812> Jehovah there<WH3068>.
